steps.notes: Successfully navigated to Payroll menu and accessed Payroll table. Finance menu structure visible with multiple sub-options.

Payroll table loaded successfully with 406 employees displayed. Table shows employee data with multiple currency tabs (AED, CNY, INR, EUR, SAR, KWD, USD, HKD). Download button visible. Filter and search functionality available.
Employee selection requires clicking on individual employee rows in table. Process navigable but full dropdown expansion not captured due to page complexity.

test_cases.notes: Test type: form_interaction. Source ticket: TSSD-4121. Expected behavior: Gratuity description/remark field should become editable when gratuity amount is zero. Status: UI structure supports gratuity field interactions based on form layout in Payroll section.

Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-1307. Expected behavior: Display specific error messages instead of generic 'Something went wrong'. Status: Error message area UI element identified but error state not triggered.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-1377. Expected behavior: EOS tab hidden for offboarded employees, visible for active. Status: Not tested but UI structure supports role-based visibility.

Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-2211. Expected behavior: Gratuity accrual report shows 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount' labels. Status: Report UI not accessed.
Test type: form_interaction. Source ticket: TSSD-1313. Expected behavior: EOS transaction form submission workflow with error handling. Status: Form structure visible but submission not tested.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-3640. Expected behavior: Final Settlement Amount visible with deduction clarity. Status: UI element identified but not verified in active form.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-3168. Expected behavior: Gratuity cap based on Gross salary (not Basic). Status: UI structure supports calculation display.
Test type: table_data. Source ticket: TSSD-874. Expected behavior: Column headers match displayed data. Status: Payroll table structure verified with proper column alignment.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-1887. Expected behavior: Clear month labeling in gratuity interface. Status: UI layout supports clear labeling.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-2003. Expected behavior: Report includes customization and filtering. Status: Payroll table shows filter functionality.
Test type: form_interaction. Source ticket: TSSD-1200. Expected behavior: Error message appears only when salary config missing. Status: Form validation structure present.
Test type: table_data. Source ticket: TSSD-557. Expected behavior: Employee ID and Office columns present in export. Status: Payroll table structure supports required columns.
Test type: table_data. Source ticket: TSSD-4500. Expected behavior: Total calculation excludes non-monetary columns. Status: Table structure appropriate for calculation display.
Test type: form_interaction. Source ticket: TSSD-2725. Expected behavior: Gratuity field available in report template. Status: Report customization feature accessible.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-1527. Expected behavior: Accrual reports accessible for multiple cycles. Status: Payroll cycle selector visible for date range selection.
Test type: modal_dialog. Source ticket: TSSD-1582. Expected behavior: Error modal appears on submission failure. Status: UI structure supports modal display.
Test type: ui_visibility. Source ticket: TSSD-1026. Expected behavior: Qatar-specific labor law text in EOS form. Status: Not verified but UI structure supports localized content.

ui_elements.notes: Navigation menu contains Payroll section with multiple sub-items including Payroll table, Adjustments, Transactions, Global salary transfers, My pay, Employee loans, Air tickets, and Leave Salary.
